author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r26095, put XFail back on merge_to_path_with_switched_children
after accidentally removing it.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(test_list): Oops, merge_to_path_with_switched_children is still XFail for
a little while longer.

author: pburba
msg: Expand coverage of merge_tests.py's merge_to_path_with_switched_children test.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_to_path_with_switched_children): Test the edge case where a merge
target's switched child which has a switched child itself.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: fix basic_tests 40. Handle a 404 during a getlock as an indication
the item doesn't exit in the repository.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/locks.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_lock): provide a variable to store the status code to
avoid an abort(). If status code is 404 raise a 'file not found' error.

author: ehu
msg: Fix issue #443 (server side).
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/util.c
(dav_svn__convert_err): Be sure not to hide hook failure errors with
[possibly unspecific] built-in error strings.
This change makes pre-revprop-change error failure information available
in the responsedescription tag (within the specific propstat).

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: fix merge_tests 33. A DELETE request can result in a 404 status when
the item was already deleted in this transaction (activity), so we shouldn't
consider it an error.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(delete_entry): add 404 as acceptable status code.
